BackstoryDef.title: unknown
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s origins have been forgotten after their memory was erased.

BackstoryDef.title: nexus guardian
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was particularly receptive to modification, and used by an archosplinter as a personal bodyguard.

BackstoryDef.title: faustian puppet
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made a foolish deal with a corrupt archosplinter, and was wiped of any memory or autonomy. The archosplinter used [PAWN_possessive] puppeted body as a guard.

BackstoryDef.title: splinter puppet
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was possessed by an archosplinter, a corrupt node of an archotech. While still alive, they will be loyal until their splinter is dealt with.
